mobios.mckoi.util
类 ByteArrayUtil

java.lang.Object
  mobios.mckoi.util.ByteArrayUtil

public class ByteArrayUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Static utilities for byte arrays.

作者：
Tobias Downer

构造方法摘要
ByteArrayUtil()
           
 
方法摘要
static char getChar(byte[] arr, int offset)
          Returns the chart at the given offset of the byte array.
static int getInt(byte[] arr, int offset)
          Returns the int at the given offset of the byte array.
static long getLong(byte[] arr, int offset)
          Returns the long at the given offset of the byte array.
static short getShort(byte[] arr, int offset)
          Returns the short at the given offset of the byte array.
static void setChar(char value, byte[] arr, int offset)
          Sets the short at the given offset of the byte array.
static void setInt(int value, byte[] arr, int offset)
          Sets the int at the given offset of the byte array.
static void setLong(long value, byte[] arr, int offset)
          Sets the long at the given offset of the byte array.
static void setShort(short value, byte[] arr, int offset)
          Sets the short at the given offset of the byte array.
